name: Arena: Last Stand
description:
Arena: Last Stand

Arena: Last Stand is small arcade shooter about fighting wave of enemies, 

Features:

Three gamemodes!

  1.  Wave Defence - Can you survive all of those waves and become the champion of this arena?
  2. Infinite Wave Defence - Enemies keep coming and you have 20 seconds to take a breath
  3. Inifinite Enemies - Kill someone and another takes his placeFound a bug?
  4. Pay to kill - Each kill gives you money which you can use to buy ammo, weapons and supplies

Here is github link for you to tell me anount it  https://github.com/CreativeMetalCat/Platformer/issues
